title: Can we finally nerf tryn
body: I am so sick of this guy just walking under my turret and killing me even though I’m Jax with my e ult and flash. He just gets to tower dive for free bc of his dumb ult. Just get rid of his crit so he doesn’t do as much damage or his heal.

replies.body: No one at level 6 should be able to tank a turret for 5 (for just ult duration) to 8 (if he starts tanking from full) seconds at level 6. Even the toughest tanks in the game can't do that for 8 seconds let alone kill you anyway. I say we should make his ultimate duration scale off level, like 4 seconds at level 6, 4.5 at level 11 and 5 at level 16. I'm even okay if it's 4/5/6, just as long as he doesn't have that capability at level 6.
I don't think a Jax main is allowed to complain about bullshit personally, but ok.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:34:45.576+0000)
>
> I don't think a Jax main is allowed to complain about bullshit personally, but ok.

Lol my champ is bs. I guess that’s why he is getting a buff right?

> [{quoted}](name=Soul Dealer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:37:41.601+0000)
>
> Lol my champ is bs. I guess that’s why he is getting a buff right?

So if Try were to get a buff, it would be because he is weak then?

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:44:41.959+0000)
>
> So if Try were to get a buff, it would be because he is weak then?

There is a reason he is not getting a buff.

> [{quoted}](name=Soul Dealer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:46:36.195+0000)
>
> There is a reason he is not getting a buff.

Right now, but I just want to confirm, by your own admission, if a champion gets buffed, it is because they are weak and need it correct?

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:51:01.965+0000)
>
> Right now, but I just want to confirm, by your own admission, if a champion gets buffed, it is because they are weak and need it correct?

Generally speaking, yes. In almost all cases if a champion gets buffed it is bc they are weak. Jax is getting bugged not so much because he is weak but because ranged top lamer bully him to hard right now. The buff does not affect jungle Jax at all and hardly affects his non ranged match ups.
legit one wardhop while he is diving you and he wont reach you anymore lmao

Do you have a few seconds to talk about our lord and saviour {{item:3123}} {{item:3076}} 

/s

He can't just walk under tower and 100-0 a Jax without being hella fed, which he was or without you grossly misplaying or standing around with low HP. Jax is actually one of the few champions that can scale with and outduel him late game as well.

From the looks of the kill map, you fed him a lot of kills in lane nowhere near a tower and he only killed you under a tower once at 20 minutes when he was already 9/0 with a large cs lead

I mean, I think Trynd can stand to use a nerf too, but I'm worried Riot's going to exchange early game dominance for making him more broken late game. I still want to be able to kill him as Darius when we're both lv 18 and full build.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:15:47.257+0000)
>
> I mean, I think Trynd can stand to use a nerf too, but I'm worried Riot's going to exchange early game dominance for making him more broken late game. I still want to be able to kill him as Darius when we're both lv 18 and full build.

Honestly his healing is the problem. He gets feee sustain in lane so you can’t poke him or trade with him easily.

> [{quoted}](name=Soul Dealer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnuAIoZx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-08-13T15:19:14.229+0000)
>
> Honestly his healing is the problem. He gets feee sustain in lane so you can’t poke him or trade with him easily.

I'd say it's more his crit or his ult. I remember there have been people whining for a long time about how Trynd's crit is bullshit because it makes trades with him fairly random.

Its that and how his E cdr works. When critting a champ, it chips off a whole 2 seconds off of its cooldown, and 1 for minions, and the current good build for him has him eing almost every second. I think his passive should be fury (obviously), but his Q passive gets moved to his passive (for the time being until he gets a rework).
you have plenty of time when he uses his heal to fight him as he has no rage, like what
Nerfs won't help, fucker needs a full scale rework.
